message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out. How about a 52.5/47.5 split?
Come on, meet me in the middle, 58-42 is as low as I'll go!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm dropping my offer slightly to account for inflation, but this is the last round I'll accept anything close to this. Take it or leave it.
